description: This file implements backend APIs for managing vendor log files in a COSA (CPE Operating System Architecture) data model. It includes functions to retrieve, set, validate, commit, and rollback vendor log file configuration parameters such as the alias, maximum size, and persistence. The file appears to be part of a larger system managing device configurations, notably for vendor logs via TR-069 standards.

methods.name: ULONG VendorLogFile_GetEntryCount(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Returns the number of vendor log file entries; in this case, always 1.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE VendorLogFile_GetEntry(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,ULONG nIndex,ULONG * pInsNumber)
methods.description: Retrieves an entry handle for a given index, returns the global manager handle.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_GetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL * pBool)
methods.description: Gets boolean parameters like 'Persistent', returns TRUE if the parameter is 'Persistent'.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_GetParamIntValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,int * pInt)
methods.description: Retrieves integer parameters; no specific implementation here.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG * puLong)
methods.description: Retrieves ULONG parameters such as 'MaximumSize', returns 0 as default.

methods.name: ULONG VendorLogFile_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves string parameters like 'Alias' and 'Name', copying predefined values.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_SetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL bValue)
methods.description: Sets boolean parameters, not implemented here.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_SetParamIntValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,int iValue)
methods.description: Sets integer parameters, not implemented here.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_SetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG uValue)
methods.description: Sets ULONG parameters, not implemented here.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets string parameters like 'Alias', intended to save updates.

methods.name: BOOL VendorLogFile_Validate(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pReturnParamName,ULONG * puLength)
methods.description: Validates the current set of parameters before commit; always returns TRUE.

methods.name: ULONG VendorLogFile_Commit(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Commits the changes; currently a placeholder returning 0.

methods.name: ULONG VendorLogFile_Rollback(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Rolls back changes; currently a placeholder returning 0.
